snippet.title: [MSX2] Sorcerian (1991) (Nihon Falcom / Brother Industries)
snippet.description:
Sorcerian for the MSX2.

This game is incredibly difficult to play without knowing Japanese. There's a DOS version ported by Sierra that is in English but the music is terrible. You create characters, form them into a party, take them into town where they can buy weapons and other equipment, and then lead them into dungeons. There were a bunch of mission packs with more dungeons released.
